title: Managing water scarcity with better data | Hong Yang

tasks.task: Present an idea for managing water scarcity in sub-Saharan Africa to improve food security.
subtasks: Explain the increasing world population and its impact on food production.
Discuss the current irrigation water usage and its consequences.
Highlight the challenge of producing more food with limited water resources.
Discuss the role of international trade in virtual water transfer.
Contrast physical water scarcity in the northern hemisphere with sub-Saharan Africa.
Present studies on factors influencing crop yield in sub-Saharan Africa.
Explain the impact of water supply versus fertilizer supply on maize yield.
Illustrate the potential for doubling or tripling maize yields in sub-Saharan Africa.
Address the importance of sustainably tapping Africa's potential for global food supply.
